body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information       Welcome to Roosevelt Campobello International Park!  The park is open every day! Some park facilities and roads are closed during the winter. Visit Operating Hours & Seasons for more information. Looking to buy a park pass? Check out our Fees & Passes page. If you're traveling with your dog, please visit our Pets page. You may want to visit Roosevelt Campobello International Park Commission's website, which administers the park, for detailed information about facilities, activities, and more.
title: Roosevelt Campobello International Park: Basic Information
